meta.name: description
meta.content: Pearsall Independent School District serves K-8th grade students, and is located in Pearsall, Tx.

a.span: Leading the way, we will be the recognized leaders in preparing students for life, college and careers.

div.span: COVID-19 - School Closure through the remainder of the 2019-20 school year.

div.style: position: absolute; overflow: hidden; left: 0px; top: 0px; width: 1800px; height: 624px;

img.alt: District Cafeteria Staff sends their thanks to PISD School Board of Trustees for providing incentive pay as they continue to feed our students during the COVID-19 pandemic school closure.

img.alt: The Pearsall ISD School Board of Trustees and Administration presented Brandi Feldhousen's family with a special plaque signifying our true appreciation for her love and commitment to the students, community, and staff of the district.

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 1800px; height: auto
div.p: The Pearsall ISD School Board of Trustees and Administration presented Brandi Feldhousen's family with a special plaque signifying our true appreciation for her love and commitment to the students, community, and staff of the district.

div.div: In partnership with families and community, our purpose is to have a learning environment that is safe, nurturing, and student centered where everyone is accountable and all students are empowered to succeed.
